question: List all adventure movies and action movies directed by Sofia Martinez.
sql_query1:
SELECT Film.Title 
FROM Film
WHERE (Film.Film_Style = "Adventure Movie" OR Film.Film_Style = "Action Movie") AND Film.Director = "Sofia Martinez"
sql_query2:
SELECT Film.Title 
FROM Film
WHERE Film.Film_Style = "Adventure Movie" OR Film.Film_Style = "Action Movie" AND Film.Director = "Sofia Martinez"
interpretation1: Show both adventure and action movies directed by Sofia Martinez.
interpretation2: Show all of the adventure movies, also show the Sofia Martinez-directed action movies.
